Andiess Juip

NPC ID8228,8229

Andiess Juip is a guard for The Myreque in Meiyerditch. The Myreque is a group of guerilla fighters intent on overthrowing Lord Lowerniel Vergidiyad Drakan, the ruler of Morytania, and liberating the region.

Andiess guards the hideout of the Sanguinesti Order of the Myreque. He can be found towards the eastern side of the hideout.

During A Taste of Hope, he is killed by the abomination. Here, it is revealed he has 68 hitpoints.
